1.panel_description: Identify the top 5 places in Europe to visit.

1.handles: Retrieves a list of top places to visit in Europe

input_vars.name: query_top_places
input_vars.description: Query to get the top 5 places to visit in Europe
input_vars.value: Top 5 places to visit in Europe currently

output_vars.name: top_places_list
output_vars.description: List of top 5 places to visit in Europe
output_vars.value: ["Paris, France", "Venice, Italy", "Prague, Czech Republic", "Barcelona, Spain", "Vienna, Austria"]

2.handles: Retrieves location details for each top place

input_vars.name: top_places_list
input_vars.description: List of top places from Perplexity
input_vars.value: ["Paris, France", "Venice, Italy", "Prague, Czech Republic", "Barcelona, Spain", "Vienna, Austria"]

output_vars.name: location_details
output_vars.description: Location details including coordinates for each place

2.panel_description: Provide real-time weather information for the top European destinations.

1.handles: Confirms coordinates for each top destination

input_vars.name: top_places_list
input_vars.description: List of top places from Perplexity
input_vars.value: ["Paris, France", "Venice, Italy", "Prague, Czech Republic", "Barcelona, Spain", "Vienna, Austria"]

output_vars.name: confirmed_coordinates

2.handles: Fetches real-time weather information for each location

input_vars.name: confirmed_coordinates

output_vars.name: weather_info
output_vars.description: Real-time weather information for each destination

3.panel_description: Suggest hotels for each top European destination.

1.handles: Retrieves Geo IDs for each top destination

input_vars.name: top_places_list
input_vars.description: List of top places from Perplexity
input_vars.value: ["Paris, France", "Venice, Italy", "Prague, Czech Republic", "Barcelona, Spain", "Vienna, Austria"]

output_vars.name: geo_ids
output_vars.value:
{
      "Paris, France": 187147,
      "Venice, Italy": 187870,
      "Prague, Czech Republic": 274707,
      "Barcelona, Spain": 187497,
      "Vienna, Austria": 190454
    }

2.handles: Finds hotels for each location using Geo IDs

input_vars.name: geo_ids
input_vars.value:
{
      "Paris, France": 187147,
      "Venice, Italy": 187870,
      "Prague, Czech Republic": 274707,
      "Barcelona, Spain": 187497,
      "Vienna, Austria": 190454
    }

output_vars.name: hotel_suggestions
output_vars.description: List of hotel suggestions for each destination
